objects.text:
• Luxurious Faux Leather Design
• Spacious Interior Compartment
• Premium Gold Hardware Details

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner presents a high-end lifestyle product with a refined and graceful aesthetic. The layout is clean, balanced, and split into two main sections—a text-focused area on the left and a product image on the right. The background features a warm gradient and subtle abstract shapes, adding sophistication and depth. The text elements are arranged hierarchically for clarity: the bold heading (`heading`) strongly captures attention, followed by a smaller subheading (`subheading`), descriptive bullet points (`description`), a prominent price tag (`price`), and a clear call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`). At the bottom, a smaller tagline (`tagline`) reinforces the product's appeal. The product image (`product_image`) is large and centered in the right section. 

Color Palette:
- Soft Cream (#F5EFE6)
- Warm Beige (#E8D5C4)
- Tan Gold (#D0B49F)
- Rich Brown (#7D5A50)
- Muted Rosewood (#C29F80)
- Accent Gold (#D5BE9D)
- Off-White (#FFFFFF)
- Deep Taupe Text (#5E4B41)
product_color: The product image features a sophisticated neutral-toned handbag, predominantly in a muted camel brown (#A66C48), giving it a timeless and versatile appeal. This color is paired harmoniously with polished gold accents (#D4AF37), seen on the hardware, branding, and chain embellishments, adding a luxurious and eye-catching contrast. The subtle texture of the leather enhances visual interest without overwhelming the minimalist design. The overall palette blends warmth and elegance, ideal for portraying classic femininity and luxury in an advertisement. Supporting banner colors could include off-white (#F9F6F2) and charcoal gray (#4F4F4F) to maintain a chic and refined aesthetic around the product.
